name: The Dark Grove
description:
An endless runner mixed with elements of a run and gun-styled game. 

SETTING:

 A planet with a "seemingly" endless forest

OBJECTIVE:

Get as far as possible

    - You have like.....zero chance of actually escaping anyway so you might as well just get as far as you can right?

NOTE: If I were you, I'd save your ammo since it gets progressively more difficult the further in the forest you get~

Dev Notes:

In the future, I'd like to add some more polish to really flesh out this game

Plans:

1. Flesh out UI

2. Add more power-ups

3. Add more enemies

4. Save Score

and more...

Donations:

I'm not going to lie and say that the donations will go towards developing this game. They may and they may not...

All I'll say is donate if you like the game and actually want to donate, otherwise, you don't have to if you don't want to, but if you do, much appreciated, and thank you very much!

Whether you do or don't, this game will still receive the attention and care that it deserves.
